title: #92Noon! ATopics/Holtus/Leber/Korzo/Zimm
description: Vikings A-Topics and conversation to start the show, opinions on the KAT/Embiid dust-up, and Chiefs vox Mitch Holtus concludes first hour. Leber and Korzo in studio for a couple segments each, then hear Mike Zimmer's X's&O's chat with PA to wrap the Thursday show!
itunes:summary: Vikings A-Topics and conversation to start the show, opinions on the KAT/Embiid dust-up, and Chiefs vox Mitch Holtus concludes first hour. Leber and Korzo in studio for a couple segments each, then hear Mike Zimmer's X's&O's chat with PA to wrap the Thursday show!
